abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown N, Unown O, and Unown D on your Bench, you may ask your opponent to take a Prize card. If he or she does, you take a Prize card. If he or she doesn't, draw a card.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Burned.
